import './contact.css' import phone from '../../images/phone.png' import email from '../../images/email.png' import address from '../../images/address.png' import { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import { useState } from 'react' export default function Contact() { const [done,setDone]=useState(false) const formRef=useRef() const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_xds8f2h', 'template_m4zjzr7', formRef.current, 'i94dqXpjAoZ10lxBR') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); setDone(true) }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (
